titles: A short treatise declaringe the detestable wickednesse, of magicall sciences as necromancie. coniurations of spirites, curiouse astrologie and such lyke. Made by Francis Coxe
author: Coxe, Francis, fl. 1560.
notes: Imprint from F.S. Ferguson report of colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
